document_data.name: Valon
document_data.mainbody: '''Valon''' was the military leader of the [[centaur]]s of [[Guard (village)|Guard]] in [[Bloodstone Barony]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Valon was known for this raw but precise intelligent with a cold and logical mind, making him perfect for the military.
document_data.History:
As War Chief, Valon served on Guard's Council of Elders alongside Chief [[Kiros]] and Elder [[Shinar]]. 

In [[1358 DR]], Valon and his fellows met [[Gareth Dragonsbane]]'s party.
